divs: Sighting Detailswell i had a crazy dream this morning and it was me unveiling ufo's very weird but i was telling my wife about it and telling her the true name of yahwey outside our place of living and i told her i saw 3 ufos flying together but in triangle form like * * * but alittle further apart but they were flying one would move alittle bit and the other two in back would follow behind approximately above casiopia the constellation sorry about spelling but anyways then we noticed to the right of us crazy lights coming towards our way ..... each dot signifies how many colors we could see white,blue,orange,red,cyan it started to move towards us than all the sudden the lights stop blinking and it starts to move towards my wife and i as i started telling her this is how my dream started i had a day ja vu from that dream at that exact moment than it was as if it turned into a ball of fire and started to head closer and closer to us than all the sudden it quikly turned left and it stopped the ball of fire thing and started to blink and went to the left a plane not far at all from this object flew over the top of it. all the sudden it turned into a ball of fire and went to the right way passed the plane blinking normal blue and white and red at the wings. It shot over within a blink of an eye and started to move closer towards the rockford airport direction than my wife and i wanted to get in the car to go chase it but by the time she ran in and got the keys we lost sight of it no cameras no pictures only with our very own eyes this is not the first time we have seen these flying objects but i decided to start recording them now for the sake that people really need to know our government is hiding these ufo's and the true name of our savior is Yahwey and when you start to speak his nameand pray you really do start seeing these things im not joking also you should really look at the clouds sometimes they cloak in our clouds and some can even look like clouds we really need to know the truth and that we are not alone and i think the ancient people knew that also i do believe that we do have a underwater civilization that we dont know of but you can definitely check the records of the navy of USO's. back in egypt as everyone should know we were enslaved by water like creatures and Yahwey helped us escape from there clutches we built false gods and worshipped them, that is against the commandments yahwey gave us and if you believe in the City of Atlantis than this will come to no suprise to you we are definitely not alone!
